verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> unto all Israel הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי <WH8085> Behold I have hearkened בְקֹֽלְכֶ֔ם <WH6963> unto your voice לְכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you אֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> in all that ye said לִ֑י וָאַמְלִ֥יךְ <WH4427> unto me and have made עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> over מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> a king

וְעַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> Now הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> here הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ ׀ <WH4428> And now behold the king מִתְהַלֵּ֣ךְ <WH1980> walketh לִפְנֵיכֶ֗ם <WH6440> before וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I am זָקַ֣נְתִּי <WH2204> you and I am old וָשַׂ֔בְתִּי <WH7867> and grayheaded וּבָנַ֖י <WH1121> and behold my sons הִנָּ֣ם <WH2009> and behold אִתְּכֶ֑ם <WH854> for וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I הִתְהַלַּ֣כְתִּי <WH1980> [are] with you and I have walked לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> before מִנְּעֻרַ֖י <WH5271> you from my childhood עַד־ <WH5704> even הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold עֲנ֣וּ <WH6030> Behold here I [am] witness בִי֩ נֶ֨גֶד <WH5048> before יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> against me before the LORD וְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> before מְשִׁיח֗וֹ <WH4899> and before his anointed אֶת־ <WH853> שׁוֹר֩ ׀ <WH7794> whose ox מִ֨י <WH4310> Whose לָקַ֜חְתִּי <WH3947> have I taken וַחֲמ֧וֹר <WH2543> ? or whose ass מִ֣י <WH4310> whose לָקַ֗חְתִּי <WH3947> have I taken וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִ֤י <WH4310> whom עָשַׁ֙קְתִּי֙ <WH6231> ? or whom have I defrauded אֶת־ <WH853> מִ֣י <WH4310> whose רַצּ֔וֹתִי <WH7533> ? whom have I oppressed וּמִיַּד־ <WH3027> ? or of whose hand מִי֙ <WH4310> Whose לָקַ֣חְתִּי <WH3947> taken כֹ֔פֶר <WH3724> have I received [any] bribe וְאַעְלִ֥ים <WH5956> to blind עֵינַ֖י <WH5869> mine eyes בּ֑וֹ וְאָשִׁ֖יב <WH7725> therewith? and I will restore לָכֶֽם׃

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> And they said לֹ֥א <WH3808> have not עֲשַׁקְתָּ֖נוּ <WH6231> Thou hast not defrauded וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or רַצּוֹתָ֑נוּ <WH7533> us nor oppressed וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> or לָקַ֥חְתָּ <WH3947> us neither hast thou taken מִיַּד־ <WH3027> hand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> of any man's מְאֽוּמָה׃ <WH3972> ought

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> about עֵ֧ד <WH5707> [is] witness יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto them The LORD בָּכֶ֗ם וְעֵ֤ד <WH5707> [is] witness מְשִׁיחוֹ֙ <WH4899> against you and his anointed הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֧א <WH3808> not מְצָאתֶ֛ם <WH4672> that ye have not found בְּיָדִ֖י <WH3027> in my hand מְא֑וּמָה <WH3972> ought וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And they answered עֵֽד׃ <WH5707> [He is] witness פ

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> unto the people יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> [It is] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> that advanced אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> Moses וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> and Aaron וַאֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> and who הֶעֱלָ֛ה <WH5927> up אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1> your fathers מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now הִֽתְיַצְּב֛וּ <WH3320> Now therefore stand still וְאִשָּׁפְטָ֥ה <WH8199> that I may reason אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> concerning לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> with you before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all צִדְק֣וֹת <WH6666> of all the righteous acts יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> which he did אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> concerning וְאֶת־ <WH854> concerning אֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> to you and to your fathers

כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בָּ֥א <WH935> was come יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> When Jacob מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> into Egypt וַיִּזְעֲק֤וּ <WH2199> cried אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> and your fathers אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> sent יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> then the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> Moses וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> and Aaron וַיּוֹצִ֤יאוּ <WH3318> which brought forth אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> your fathers מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וַיֹּשִׁב֖וּם <WH3427> and made them dwell בַּמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַֽיִּשְׁכְּח֖וּ <WH7911> And when they forgat אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their God וַיִּמְכֹּ֣ר <WH4376> he sold אֹתָ֡ם <WH853> בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> them into the hand סִֽיסְרָא֩ <WH5516> of Sisera שַׂר־ <WH8269> captain צְבָ֨א <WH6635> of the host חָצ֜וֹר <WH2674> of Hazor וּבְיַד־ <WH3027> and into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וּבְיַד֙ <WH3027> and into the hand מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> and they fought בָּֽם׃

וַיִּזְעֲק֤וּ <WH2199> And they cried אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD [וַיֹּאמֶר כ] (וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> answer ק) חָטָ֔אנוּ <WH2398> We have sinned כִּ֤י <WH3588> because עָזַ֙בְנוּ֙ <WH5800> because we have forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַנַּעֲבֹ֥ד <WH5647> and have served אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּעָלִ֖ים <WH1168> Baalim וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעַשְׁתָּר֑וֹת <WH6252> and Ashtaroth וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now הַצִּילֵ֛נוּ <WH5337> but now deliver מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> us out of the hand אֹיְבֵ֖ינוּ <WH341> of our enemies וְנַעַבְדֶֽךָּ׃ <WH5647> and we will serve

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יְרֻבַּ֣עַל <WH3378> Jerubbaal וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּדָ֔ן <WH917> and Bedan וְאֶת־ <WH853> יִפְתָּ֖ח <WH3316> and Jephthah וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <WH8050> and Samuel וַיַּצֵּ֨ל <WH5337> and delivered אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> מִיַּ֤ד <WH3027> you out of the hand אֹֽיְבֵיכֶם֙ <WH341> of your enemies מִסָּבִ֔יב <WH5439> on every side וַתֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> and ye dwelled בֶּֽטַח׃ <WH983> safe

וַתִּרְא֗וּ <WH7200> And when ye saw כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that נָחָ֞שׁ <WH5176> that Nahash מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּוֹן֮ <WH5983> of Ammon בָּ֣א <WH935> came עֲלֵיכֶם֒ <WH5921> against וַתֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> against you ye said לִ֔י לֹ֕א <WH3808> No כִּי־ <WH3588> but מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> unto me Nay but a king יִמְלֹ֣ךְ <WH4427> shall reign עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> over וַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> over us when the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God מַלְכְּכֶֽם׃ <WH4428> [was] your king

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> here הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> Now therefore behold the king אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you בְּחַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH977> whom ye have chosen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you שְׁאֶלְתֶּ֑ם <WH7592> [and] whom ye have desired וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold נָתַ֧ן <WH5414> hath set יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and behold the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> over מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> a king

אִם־ <WH518> If תִּֽירְא֣וּ <WH3372> If ye will fear אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD וַעֲבַדְתֶּ֤ם <WH5647> and serve אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> וּשְׁמַעְתֶּ֣ם <WH8085> him and obey בְּקֹל֔וֹ <WH6963> his voice וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not תַמְר֖וּ <WH4784> and not rebel אֶת־ <WH854> against פִּ֣י <WH6310> against the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וִהְיִתֶ֣ם <WH1961> then גַּם־ <WH1571> both אַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> you וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> then shall both ye and also the king אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who מָלַ֣ךְ <WH4427> that reigneth עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> over אַחַ֖ר <WH310> over you continue following יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

וְאִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֤א <WH3808> you will not תִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> But if ye will not obey בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּמְרִיתֶ֖ם <WH4784> but rebel אֶת־ <WH854> against פִּ֣י <WH6310> against the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְהָיְתָ֧ה <WH1961> then יַד־ <WH3027> then shall the hand יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD בָּכֶ֖ם וּבַאֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> be against you as [it was] against your fathers

גַּם־ <WH1571> Now therefore עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> now הִתְיַצְּב֣וּ <WH3320> stand וּרְא֔וּ <WH7200> and see אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> thing הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> this great הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> which the LORD עֹשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> will do לְעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5869> before your eyes

הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> not קְצִיר־ <WH7105> harvest חִטִּים֙ <WH2406> [Is it] not wheat הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> age אֶקְרָא֙ <WH7121> bewray אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְיִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and he shall send קֹל֖וֹת <WH6963> thunder וּמָטָ֑ר <WH4306> and rain וּדְע֣וּ <WH3045> that ye may perceive וּרְא֗וּ <WH7200> and see כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that רָעַתְכֶ֤ם <WH7451> that your wickedness רַבָּה֙ <WH7227> [is] great אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which עֲשִׂיתֶם֙ <WH6213> which ye have done בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לִשְׁא֥וֹל <WH7592> in asking לָכֶ֖ם מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> you a king ס

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> called שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> So Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> sent יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD קֹלֹ֥ת <WH6963> thunder וּמָטָ֖ר <WH4306> and rain בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he וַיִּירָ֨א <WH3372> feared כָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> and all the people מְאֹ֛ד <WH3966> greatly אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <WH8050> and Samuel

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> said כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> And all the people אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <WH8050> unto Samuel הִתְפַּלֵּ֧ל <WH6419> Pray בְּעַד־ <WH1157> for עֲבָדֶ֛יךָ <WH5650> for thy servants אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God וְאַל־ <WH408> nay נָמ֑וּת <WH4191> that we die כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָסַ֤פְנוּ <WH3254> not for we have added עַל־ <WH5921> unto כָּל־ <WH3605> all חַטֹּאתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH2403> unto all our sins רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> [this] evil לִשְׁאֹ֥ל <WH7592> to ask לָ֖נוּ מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> us a king ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵ֤ל <WH8050> And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָם֙ <WH5971> unto the people אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֔אוּ <WH3372> Fear אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> You עֲשִׂיתֶ֔ם <WH6213> not ye have done אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> all this wickedness הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise אַ֗ךְ <WH389> yet אַל־ <WH408> not תָּס֙וּרוּ֙ <WH5493> yet turn not aside מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> from following יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַעֲבַדְתֶּ֥ם <WH5647> but serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבַבְכֶֽם׃ <WH3824> with all your heart

וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> must not תָּס֑וּרוּ <WH5493> And turn ye not aside כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> because אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> for [then should ye go] after הַתֹּ֗הוּ <WH8414> vain אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יוֹעִ֛ילוּ <WH3276> [things] which cannot profit וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or יַצִּ֖ילוּ <WH5337> nor deliver כִּי־ <WH3588> because תֹ֥הוּ <WH8414> for they [are] vain הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like
